abstract: Germany guarantees Latin Amer deliveries after Oct 1; chances for Ital ships to evade Brit blockade weighed

headline.main: NAZI SALES OFFERS HELD PROPAGANDA; Solicitation for Business in Latin America Viewed as Political Move NO ORDERS ARE PLACED Buyers See Little Likelihood of Enforcing Guarantees of Deliveries

lead_paragraph: German offers to deliver merchandise to Latin America on and after Oct. 1 have been made more for their political and psychological effects than with any idea actually of shipping the merchandise, foreign traders said here yesterday. The German offers, which embrace.
